title: How are we supposed to kill Illaoi?
body: Seriously the bitch heals SO much with so little effort, even with grievous wounds she healed like crazy

replies.body:
for most champions you need to respect her windows. If she's sitting in a nest of 3-4 tentacles and she has her E up then your priority needs to baiting her E to whiff. If she hits it do not engage, you'll die or lose so much HP that you can't fight her pushing. Instead you should use your time either getting away to minimize your damage or killing the tentacles if she focuses your soul. You want to take any opportunity to kill tentacles so you can minimize her damage. 

When she whiffs E you need to go in ASAP before she has it up again. After that, gauge if you can kill her if she ults (if she has it.) also. Move clockwise or CCW during her ultimate. It helps you dodge tentacle damage better since you want to move perpendicular to where you are to avoid damage. This gets easier to do the more MS you have. 

Her 2 big cooldowns are E and R. Always be conscious of those.

She is like a WoW boss
Dodge her tentacles. 
Don't stack for her R, or if you did-run away
Try to bait her E, if you didn't and she caught your soul-run away
It doesn't matter if you have number or item advantage, just DON'T IGNORE HER SPELLS. She can't really do much if you do
Play her, trust me, she isn't anywhere near as OP as she looks.
Grievous Wounds tends to cut her healing substantially if you didn't feed her beforehand. Worst comes to worst just pick Mordekaiser and ult after she ults.

In the words of Illaoi

{{champion:420}} : "Move!"

She has telegraphed skillshots and no hard CC. Sidestep the E, sidestep the Q, and walk away when she ults. Everything she's gonna do to you can be avoided easily.
stop fighting in her ult. if she has her ult up, you're (probably) not going to outdamage her healing.
From range. You're not supposed to win if she gets close enough to ult you.

One way is to destroy all of her tentacles, but I understand that isnt always possible, another way is to kite her away from her "safe space" being where she has the most tentacles, Dashing away from her when she begins her R animation is another way, so she gets less tentacles from it. Granted, yes, all of these are easier said then done, I understand that.

Don't stand in her tentacles when she ults. 
It helps a bit, but otherwise yes, she heals a shit ton.

I mentioned how to beat her on another account but that ones banned till Friday.
seeing as it's banned for telling the truth I will no longer be sharing how to beat illaoi.
